title: About brand's new skin
body:
I was just looking at his skins recently and then a saw it T.T

SPIRIT FIRE {{champion:63}} !!!!

I haven't looked at the patch notes but as soon as i came across this browsing my champ screen I had an INSTANT VISUAL ORGASM!!!!

I was gonna wait for Zombie {{champion:63}}  on halloween but 

OMG WTF GOD DAMN

PURPLE FIRE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Ps. Zombie has green fire but 

GREEN FIRE < PURPLE FIRE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

PPS. TY RITO FOR PURPLE FIRE!!!!!!

replies.body: Not only purple fire, but purple fire with Tikki creatures in it.
